title: Gun Frontier
synopsis: It is a harsh and barren wasteland, where the weak aren't allowed to dream. It is also a sacred land for true men, for there is no place a man can feel more alive. This is the Gun Frontier. Sea Pirate Captain Harlock and the errant samurai, Tochiro arrive in the United States on the Western Frontier. Along with a mysterious woman they meet along the way, the two friends challenge sex rings, bandits, and corrupt sheriff. They are searching for a lost clan of Japanese immigrants, and they will tear Gun Frontier from end to end until they find it.
voices: ['Takemoto, Eiji', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Matsumoto, Rica', 'Sakuta, Osamu', 'Shindo, Naomi', 'Shindo, Naomi', 'Hirohashi, Ryou', 'Ohta, Shiori', 'Touma, Yumi', 'Kakazu, Yumi']
